::Aerotaur::

       Aerotaur proceeded into the darkened tunnel cautiously=
.  His optics 
glowed red as they shifted to the infrared spectrum to aid h=
im in his 
investigation.  The tunnel dove deeper into the mountain side, d=
eeper still 
into realms where the sun had never been seen.  The skittering=
 of insectoid 
legs could be heard all about him.  He paid the noises littl=
e heed.

       Looming before him there stood a beast, it's eight legged c=
arapace 
supporting a grotesque humanoid body.  Aerotaur felt himself ill a=
s he 
approached the creature with his weapons drawn.  The beast growled an=
d 
beckoned him closer.  As it spoke it's guttural voice was barely 
unders=
tandable.  "Come with me Erobrer av M=F8rke."  The beast turned away and 
l=
ead Aerotaur down the tunnel into a large chamber.

       Aerotaur nearly =
collapsed in awe as he looked around the chamber.  The 
stalactites and sta=
lagmites scattered around the room, one in the center was 
glowing with an =
internal heat casting heat shadows throughout the room.  
After a short whi=
le the beast appeared again behind him, giving him a solid 
shove into the =
room.  Aerotaur stumbled forward tumbling headfirst into the 
glowing stala=
gmite.  Then through the glowing stalagmite and out into a 
bustling city o=
f transformers under a star-filled sky.  As he stood staring 
at the crowd =
he heard the beast behind him "Welcome to Elektrisk Landsby, 
heart of Inne=
r-Cybertron."

--part1_6b.ac9f413.2b8af059_boundary
